prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Drums, Guitar, Piano, Organ, but without Reed.
captions:
Style 1:
This composition features Piano, Bass, Guitar, Organ, and Drums, but no Reed.

Style 2:
This song is comprised of Bass, Drums, Guitar, Piano, and Organ, but Reed is absent.

Style 3:
This piece has Bass, Drums, Guitar, Piano, and Organ, Reed excluded.
